entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
